title: Alexander Hamilton
subtitle_html: 26th President of the United States
author: Tom Hartung
card_content_html: This image o f the personality of Alexander Hamilton, one of America's Founding Fathers, shows he is ____________. In 1777 he became an aide to the Contenental Army's General George Washington, and he wrote over half of the Federalist Papers in the late 1780s. Hamilton served as the first Secretary of the Treasury of the United States, from 1789–1795, and in 1791 he played central role in forming the First Bank of the United States.
card_first_person_html: Alexander Hamilton's image contrasts strongly with Thomas Jefferson's, and they certainly had different backgrounds and temperaments.
